top.title: High-speed train crash in Spain kills at least 39
top.summary: More than 400 passengers were on board the trains that derailed near the city of Córdoba, in Spain's worst rail crash in more than a decade.

top.title: Watch: Spain train crash survivors describe 'absolutely terrifying' scene
top.summary: Passengers recount the moment two trains collided between Málaga and Madrid on Sunday evening.

top.title: US believes its power matters more than international law, UN chief tells BBC
top.summary: António Guterres says Washington's "clear conviction" is that multilateral solutions are irrelevant.

top.title: How crypto criminals stole $700 million from people - often using age-old tricks
top.summary: As crypto wealth continues to grow, criminals are mixing sophisticated hacks with deception, and in some cases, real life violence.

top.title: Google appeals landmark antitrust verdict over search monopoly
top.summary: The tech giant is seeking a pause on court-ordered fixes aimed at limiting its monopoly power.

top.title: ChatGPT to carry adverts for some users
top.summary: OpenAI is also expanding its cheaper subscription tier, ChatGPT Go, to all countries where it operates.
